New Records: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander passed Gary Payton for the second most games in franchise history with 12 games with 30+ points on 70%+ shooting with the Thunder
SGA's 12 games with 30+ points on 70%+ shooting with the Thunder is the second most in franchise history behind Kevin Durant's 14
Key Match Events: Thunder beat the Knicks to improve to 5-1 following a loss this season
Paolo Banchero returned for the Magic in his first game since Oct. 30
Bucks held off the Magic for their third straight win
Jokić and Westbrook became the first teammates to each record a triple-double in the same game multiple times in a single season
The Kings got a career night from Domantas Sabonis (23 pts, 28 reb) and used a dominant 4th quarter (38-21) to defeat the Celtics
The Pacers got a pair of 25-point games from Tyrese Haliburton (10 ast) and Pascal Siakam (9 reb) to race past the shorthanded Warriors for their fifth straight win
Michael Jordan, DeMar DeRozan, Zach LaVine led the Bulls past the Wizards
CJ McCollum led the Pelicans to their third win in the last five games
Pre-Game Insights: The Thunder wasted no time getting back to their winning ways after their franchise-record 15-game win streak was snapped
Paolo Banchero returned for the Magic in his first game since Oct. 30
The Bucks leapfrogged Orlando for fourth place in the East and took a 2-0 lead in the season series
The teams meet again Wednesday in Milwaukee
Jokić and Westbrook rank first and third, respectively, on the all-time triple-double list and added to their totals in historic fashion on Friday
The Kings got a combined 65 points from DeMar DeRozan (24), Malik Monk (22) and Keegan Murray (19) with leading scorer De’Aaron Fox missing his third straight game
The Pacers got a pair of 25-point games from Tyrese Haliburton (10 ast) and Pascal Siakam to race past the shorthanded Warriors for their fifth straight win
Bennedict Mathurin (21 pts, 10 reb) posted his sixth 20/10 game of the season and is a team-best plus-99 in 154 minutes played during the win streak
Without their top three scorers – Steph Curry, Andrew Wiggins and Jonathan Kuminga – the Warriors were held under 100 points for the 11th time, falling to 1-10 in those games
Post-Match Reflections: SGA's 30-9 run spanning the 1st and 2nd quarters and a combined 70 points from Shai Gilgeous-Alexander (39 pts, 71.4% FG) and Isaiah Joe (31 pts, career-high 8 3pm) led the Thunder to the win
Isaiah Hartenstein received a warm reception in his return to MSG, before finishing with six points, nine boards, six dimes, two steals and two blocks

Paolo Banchero showed no rust after his 72-day absence, but a combined 70 points from Giannis Antetokounmpo (41 pts, 14 reb) and Damian Lillard (29 pts) was too much to overcome as the Bucks held off the Magic for their third straight win
With his 43rd career game with 40+ points and 10+ rebounds, Giannis tied Shaquille O’Neal and Joel Embiid for the sixth most 40/10 games in NBA history
Jokić and Westbrook became the first teammates to each record a triple-double in the same game multiple times in a single season
The Kings snapped a six-game losing streak to Boston by joining OKC as the only teams to hold the Celtics under 100 points this season
The Pacers got a pair of 25-point games from Tyrese Haliburton (10 ast) and Pascal Siakam to race past the shorthanded Warriors for their fifth straight win
Bennedict Mathurin (21 pts, 10 reb) posted his sixth 20/10 game of the season and is a team-best plus-99 in 154 minutes played during the win streak
Without their top three scorers – Steph Curry, Andrew Wiggins and Jonathan Kuminga – the Warriors were held under 100 points for the 11th time, falling to 1-10 in those games

Others: The NBA announced that it has postponed Saturday’s home games for the Lakers (vs. Spurs) and the Clippers (vs. Hornets) due to the ongoing wildfires in the Los Angeles area. The dates for the rescheduled games will be announced at a later time.
The entire NBA, NBPA, WNBA and WNBPA family sends its thoughts and support to the community of Los Angeles during this challenging time. To learn more, get help and/or support, visit NBA Cares.

A Saturday marathon… 9+ hours of hoops get under way today on League Pass, beginning with the Hawks hosting the Rockets (3 ET). To highlight Saturday’s five-game slate, Ja Morant and Anthony Edwards will go head-to-head as the Grizzlies face the Wolves in primetime (8 ET).
The NBA hasn’t seen a player record 225+ steals in a single season since Allen Iverson in 2003. This season, Hawks guard Dyson Daniels is on pace for 228, with 106 swipes through 34 games played.
Hailing from Bendigo, Australia, where his father played pro basketball, Daniels, 21, was tagged with the nickname “The Great Barrier Thief,” by his teammate Larry Nance Jr.
